snippet: BMW iVentures, an investment arm of BMW Group, publicly unveiled its start-up incubator space on Monday night in Manhattan.
abstract: BMW iVentures, an investment arm of BMW Group, publicly unveiled its start-up incubator space on Monday night in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: BMW iVentures, an investment arm begun in tandem with the automaker's i subbrand, has established a start-up incubator on Morton Street in the West Village.

headline.main: BMW Plants Seeds of Silicon Valley in the West Village
